Summary: UFO got brighter then disappeared this is the second time that I observed this
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Grand Ledge
There were no other sightings in Grand Ledge on or around July 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThe first time we were hunting and about 7 of us saw this. The UFO got brighter and then disappeared. It was not coming down and did not have a tail. The second time it happened was years later when we went outside to see the space station. it was exactly the same. I believe that they are going through some type of portial.
